description: Contains information relating to Drug Utilization Review (DUR) conflicts in adjudication records. Adjudication records are used by Ambulatory Pharmacy during prescription copay adjudication.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the adjudication record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique, internal contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of the contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: REASON_FOR_SERV_C_NAME
columns.description:
NCPDP code identifying the type of utilization conflict detected or the reason for the pharmacist's professional service.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries:

Adverse Drug Reaction

columns.name: CLINICAL_SIGN_C_NAME
columns.description:
NCPDP code identifying the significance or severity level of a clinical event.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Major


Moderate


Minor

columns.name: OTHER_PHR_IND_C_NAME
columns.description:
NCPDP code indicating the pharmacy responsible for the previous event involved in the DUR conflict.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not Specified


Your Pharmacy


Other Pharmacy in Same Chain


Other Pharmacy

columns.name: PREV_FILL_DATE
columns.description: The date that the prescription was previously filled

columns.name: QUANT_OF_PREV_FILL
columns.description: Amount of the conflicting agent that was previously filled (in metric decimal units).

columns.name: DATABASE_INDICAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
NCPDP code identifying the source of drug information used for DUR processing.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


First Databank


Medi-Span


Micromedix/Medical Economics


Processor Developed


Other

columns.name: OTH_PRSCRBR_IND_C_NAME
columns.description:
NCPDP code comparing the prescriber of the current prescription to the prescriber of the previously filled conflicting prescription.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not Specified


Same Prescriber


Other Prescriber

columns.name: DUR_FREE_TXT_MSG
columns.description: Text that provides additional detail regarding a DUR conflict.

columns.name: PROF_SERVICE_C_NAME
columns.description:

columns.name: EFFORT_LEVEL_C_NAME
columns.description:
